rating_comment:
No ventilation in home and very small space. Check-in was flexible and good. But as the time passed the way of talking is very unfriendly nature and threatening to report asking for money. No mentioned housekeeping resources. Giving very personal comments and misbehaving. Before checkin she didn't mention that money will be extra for visitor but after checkin asking for extra money otherwise threatening to report for visitor.
Didn't like the experience overall.

She took care of all our needs when I told her. She made sure that we won't face any discomfort even if it is our responsibility and not hers. I will come back to her place whenever I am not staying with my relatives in Shiliguri

Neera is a kind of host, who takes responsibility on her side to ensure that you don't miss important point during your trip, once she knows about it. It really helps you to get a smooth experience beyond your expectation. I had a great stay with my family at Neera's place during transit to Sikkim and return. Our requirements were less however Neera's facility promises much more.
Thank you for hosting us. it was nice and pleasant stay

Neera was very helpful right from the start and also gave respect to our privacy too . Very helpful and good person .
Thank you Neera for making our stay comfortable and safe.
I appreciate all the help you offered.

Neera's place is absolutely brilliant if you want to spend a quiet stay at Siliguri. The place is a 10-minute walk from the Tenzing Norgay bus stop. You will find all your amenities within walking distance. The place is spacious and well-organised. With two rooms and a kitchen, it is a perfect place for a short or a slightly longer stay. I hope to book again when visiting Siliguri.

We had a great time at Neeras place. It's away from the main road so no traffic noise. The terrace on the roof with all the plants was beautiful. The apartment was clean and spacious. Having a TV would have been great, but I believe some previous guest broke it before us. Neera has been responsive, helpful and we even got to try her delicious momos!

My stay at Neeraj's place was exceptional, both due to the apartment and Neera's excellent hosting.
Neera, a kind and professional host, promptly attended to our requests for extra cotton sheets and utensils for pasta cooking. She proactively communicated a broken TV amenity upon booking, displaying a high level of professionalism. Neera even accommodated a late night key handover for a delivery.
Apartment details:
1. The kitchen was a chef's haven, well-lit with ample space on the kitchen top.
2. Each room boasted a private balcony with lovely green views.
3. The living room's rare, comfy sofa easily seated three.
4. The AC in the main bedroom was a blessing amidst the humidity.
5. A standing fan added to comfort in the living room and kitchen.
6. A cozy table in the kitchen was perfect for meals.
7. Plentiful cushions ensured everyone's comfort.
8. For Swiggy deliveries, precise directions were necessary.
9. A slightly larger fridge would better accommodate supplies for three.

My overall experience during the stay was highly satisfactory, and I particularly appreciated the host, Neera. Here are the specifics of my stay:
The Airbnb is located in a beautiful area of Siliguri, near the Gurung Basti Buddhist Monastery.
Notably, there is a comfortable couch in the living room, a rare find in many Indian Airbnbs.
The accommodation features 2 bedrooms, each with its own private balcony.
The modern front load washing machine was a positive aspect, although we didn't utilize it during our stay.
Neera, the host, displayed exceptional kindness by providing us with additional cotton bed sheets upon request.
Neera respected our privacy, which is a crucial expectation for many guests.
A notable amenity for tourists was the AC in the main bedroom, greatly appreciated in the humid weather.
No cons at all

The place is exactly as shown in the image. Felt right at home. Its surroundings are very perfect. Neera is an amazing host. It's hard to find a person with such a positive approach in everything. Will highly recommend it.
